entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria (Hartland)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 44 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
